body:
Hello Everyone,

The deadline to register for the Radiance workshop is Monday August 8th.  Please register by then if you are going to attend.  Here's the link: http://radiance.lbl.gov/registration

There are still presentation slots available for the workshop.  Please send me a title and description for your presentation if you will present.

Thanks,
Andy
subject: [Radiance-general] International Radiance Workshop
